text: 1.20 Jop 12.7-9, Sng 19.1, Apo 14.17, 17.27, Hib 11.3 God ne lum awl alwol gɨlɨl, tap okok mɨdupsek gɨlak ñɨn ak, mɨd dad apɨl mɨñɨl ñɨn awl, binɨb okok mɨdupsek tap gɨlak anɨb ak nepal. Ne anɨgek, binbɨ okok kɨli God gos ne ogɨnap we gɨl mɨdeb ak nɨgɨnɨgel tek lup. Kɨli God tap gup anɨb ak jɨj ak nɨŋɨd, kɨles awl ne pel pelnep mɨdeb ak nɨgɨnɨgel tek lup. Ak pen, kɨli nop ma nopun apal. Apal anɨb ak, God ne nɨgek, kanɨb kɨli olap ameb tek ma mɨdeb.
